pr_title: Update Jakarta 9 features Subsystem-Name to match Jakarta spec name

timeline.message:
Update Jakarta 9 features Subsystem-Name to match Jakarta spec name

- Also add eeCompatible-9.0 to convenience features.

timeline.bodyText: Extra space between "3.0  specification"? Includes other translations as well.
timeline.author: nmittles
timeline.diffHunk:

 #
 
-description=The Bean Validation 3.0 specification provides an annotation-based model for validating \
+description=The Jakarta Bean Validation 3.0  specification provides an annotation-based model for validating \
